title: Detox

cleaned_text: White House Organic Detox is a drink like no other! Full of Organic Ingredients, enjoy the tangy lemon, soothing honey and delicious cinnamon flavors in one drink! Made with our signature Organic Apple Cider Vinegar and with the MOTHER. No mixing, measuring... Organic Detox is ready to drink! GLUTEN FREE | ORGANIC | NON GMO PROJECT VERIFIED Learn more about DETOX here: [whitehousefoods.com/pages/detox](https://www.whitehousefoods.com/pages/detox) Ingredients: Filtered Water, Certified Organic Apple Cider Vinegar, Organic Honey, Organic Lemon Concentrate, and Natural Cinnamon Flavor.
